title: Moneypaytime
author: Moneypaytime
content: I exchange usdt to euro.12% fee so you get have 1000 euro you get 880eurIBAN euro area instant transactions. Im looking to start run long term partnership here to be number one fast and private exchanger.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: With that fee you cannot be the number 1 exchange guy as there are people out there offering the same service for a much lower fee. Do you offer escrow?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Moneypaytime on June 20, 2023, 06:23:50 PMIm looking to start run long term partnership here to be number one fast and private exchanger.Good luck to you for that.You have no trade history and you are asking for crypto in return of fiat. How is someone going to have confidence that you will not try to get a refund of the money you will send and scam them? Very tricky.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 08:03:25 PMQuote from: Moneypaytime on June 20, 2023, 06:23:50 PMIm looking to start run long term partnership here to be number one fast and private exchanger.Good luck to you for that.You have no trade history and you are asking for crypto in return of fiat. How is someone going to have confidence that you will not try to get a refund of the money you will send and scam them? Very tricky.With your experience over some years here you would still want to use a newbies who are likely to scam you, I don't know how these newbie behaves most at times because they think others aren't wiser than them or what, is it that easier for newbie to make account and immediately wants to offer some services to people how? Besides we have series of exchange were one would easily exchange their currency without going into this cheap hustlers.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on June 21, 2023, 08:36:33 AMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 08:03:25 PMQuote from: Moneypaytime on June 20, 2023, 06:23:50 PMIm looking to start run long term partnership here to be number one fast and private exchanger.Good luck to you for that.You have no trade history and you are asking for crypto in return of fiat. How is someone going to have confidence that you will not try to get a refund of the money you will send and scam them? Very tricky.With your experience over some years here you would still want to use a newbies who are likely to scam you, I don't know how these newbie behaves most at times because they think others aren't wiser than them or what, is it that easier for newbie to make account and immediately wants to offer some services to people how? Besides we have series of exchange were one would easily exchange their currency without going into this cheap hustlers.What I get from the topic is that the OP is trying to exchange privately, I don't think we are talking about any exchange site here. About using exchange, I don't use exchanges which are new and starting their business. For me even with a higher fee, a reputable one is much peaceful. However, mostly I do p2p trade. So, I already have network of a trusted circle to exchange coins between each other. I think some of us who are in the forum from long time, they already have their own trusted circle to exchange coin to each other either for cash or crypto.

comments.author: Doubler Disburser 232515
comments.body: Quote from: Moneypaytime on June 20, 2023, 06:23:50 PMI exchange usdt to euro.12% fee so you get have 1000 euro you get 880eurIBAN euro area instant transactions. Im looking to start run long term partnership here to be number one fast and private exchanger.Ever watch the movie "Buster"?  It came out in the 80's and told the story of one of the "Great Train" robbers Buster Edwards who slowly went broke trying to launder his share of the stolen money.  He'd take £1,000 to the fence and get back something like £750.  Your "fees" to exchange Euros to crypto remind me of that fence's fees.How come you don't use the Euro € symbol?  Don't your keyboard have one?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 23, 2023, 12:10:58 PMQuote from: Adbitco on June 21, 2023, 08:36:33 AMQuote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 20, 2023, 08:03:25 PMQuote from: Moneypaytime on June 20, 2023, 06:23:50 PMIm looking to start run long term partnership here to be number one fast and private exchanger.Good luck to you for that.You have no trade history and you are asking for crypto in return of fiat. Very tricky.With your experience over some years here you would still want to use a newbies who are likely to scam you, I don't know how these newbie behaves most at times because they think others aren't wiser than them or what, is it that easier for newbie to make account and immediately wants to offer some services to people how? Besides we have series of exchange were one would easily exchange their currency without going into this cheap hustlers.What I get from the topic is that the OP is trying to exchange privately, I don't think we are talking about any exchange site here. About using exchange, I don't use exchanges which are new and starting their business. For me even with a higher fee, a reputable one is much peaceful. However, mostly I do p2p trade. So, I already have network of a trusted circle to exchange coins between each other. I think some of us who are in the forum from long time, they already have their own trusted circle to exchange coin to each other either for cash or crypto.Good!This is exactly my point when I looked at what op said, exchanging privately is very risky coupled with him being a newbie. This is a very challenging  and risky deal as there would be no trust from op and again being a beginner instead most people like using their circle of friends either from one locality or across the forum here with a reputations.
